import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import data from '../data'; function MenuScreen (props) { console.log(props.match.params.id); const menu = data.menus.find(x=> x._id === props.match.params.id ); return
Back to Result

  • {menu.name}

  • {menu.rating} Stars ({menu.numReviews} Reviews)
  • {menu.price}
  • Description:
    {menu.Description}
  • Price: {menu.price}
  • Status: {menu.Status}
  • Qty:
} export default MenuScreen;
